name: Super Pac Munch
description: Super Pac Munch is a simple Pac Man derivative.  With each new wave you must avoid all of the ghosts (and these little guys can show up in numbers, let me tell you), and eat all of the white dots to advance.  There really is no grid or maze; rather, you play in an open space.  If you run out of time, you are penalized.  For extra points you can eat food and treasure bonuses.  Features music, sound effects, cute graphics, and high score tracking.
